full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DRANG NGES RNAM 'BYED KYI DKA' GNAD LAS BRTZAMS TE DPAL LDAN THAL 'GYUR BA'I GZHUNG GI DGONGS DON RAB GSAL SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @076A *, ,(CES DRANG NGES RNAM 'BYED KYI DKA' GNAD LAS BRTZAMS TE DPAL LDAN THAL 'GYUR BA'I GZHUNG GI DGONGS DON RAB GSAL SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, MKHYEN DPYOD MCHOG TU YANGS PA'I GZHUNG LUGS SMRA BA'I DBANG PO RAB 'BYAMS PA MKHAN PO SKAL BZANG BLO GROS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^MKHAN ZUR BSKAL BZANG DGE 'PHEL GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, RANG GI NYE GNAS PA DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG SKAL BZANG DGE 'DUN 'PHEL GYIS BRIS PA'O,, ,,) 'DIS KYANG 'JAM MGON RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR MDZAD PA'I RGYUR 'GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,
